name: Tower Shooter (VisionElf)
description:
Use your mouse to control your towers.

  • Press A or Q to build a Tower
  • Press Z or W to build a Wall
  • You can build your own maze using the walls
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to sell buildings
  • Press Next Wave to spawn enemies

Survive as long as possible.

Assets used:

  • DOTween by Demigiant
  • MagicArsenal by Archanor VFX
